Description: Verify user is not able to sign up with invalid phone number
Steps:
1. Enter valid data on the First Name field
2. Enter valid data on the Last Name field
3. Enter valid data on the Email field
4. Enter invalid data on the  Phone Number field e.g. less than 10 numbers
5. Enter valid data on the Password field
6. Enter valid data on the Confirm Password field
7. Click the Sign Up button
Expected Result: Error should be shown "Please enter a valid phone number, example: 012345678901"
